https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9OLxobWLgGwbU31RtekFfadvBAj.jpg Only Charles Dickens himself has told the tale of Scrooge better then Green 7's A Carol of Christmas. This rendition of Dickens' classic tale stays true to the story, while adding some laughs along the way. A Carol of Christmas
